simulator.payloads

Class FaultPayload

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulator.payloads.Payload
      • simulator.payloads.PhysicalPayload
        • simulator.payloads.FaultPayload
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<Payload>

    public abstract class FaultPayload
extends PhysicalPayload
    No Fault payloads are currently implemented, but if you wanted to fault specific objects, you can create a new payload class that descends from this class and use simulator.faults.FaultPayloadFault to inject it at certain times using the -ff file.
